message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this unique product. After considering its value, I would like to propose a price of $180. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $220. What do you think?
Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $200. I hope we can reach an agreement.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I'm willing to consider it, but I'm still looking to get a bit closer to my target price. I'll sell the product to you for $210. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've reviewed it carefully and am willing to consider a price of $205. This brings us closer to a mutually agreeable price, while still staying within my budget.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob! I'm getting close to accepting, but I still need to get a bit closer to my target price. I'll sell the product to you for $215. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $210. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.
